Title: An introduction to dento-legal issues and risks in orthodontics
Abstract: © 2015 Macmillan Publishers Limited. All rights reserved.Orthodontic treatment is not without risk. This article aims to look at some of the dento-legal issues surrounding orthodontic treatment, the risks to both the clinician and the patient, and how some of these risks can be mitigated.
